frozen_definition.name: DailyLingo
frozen_definition.signal_source: Long-term Duolingo users: '1107-day streak but barely scratched surface' and 'people logging in not to learn but so they didn't lose'
frozen_definition.description: Micro-practice language learning focused on real progress over streaks, with 2-minute daily lessons that build actual conversational skills
frozen_definition.target_user: Language learners frustrated with streak pressure who want consistent micro-practice that leads to real speaking ability
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users report 'false sense of accomplishment' and 'chasing XP instead of challenges' with existing gamified apps
core_loop: No streaks, just gentle consistency nudges
frozen_definition.differentiation: No streaks or gamification, focus on practical conversation over theoretical learning
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes native speaker audio, advanced conversation practice, and cultural context lessons

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic lessons, premium for native audio and advanced conversation practice
